content.text:
# President of the National Assembly of Ecuador

| body            =
| insignia        = Flag of the National Assembly of Ecuador.svg
| insigniasize    = 150px
| insigniacaption = Flag of the National Assembly
| image           = Niels Olsen (SESIÓN N.º 005 DEL PLENO DE LA ASAMBLEA NACIONAL. ECUADOR, 27 DE MAYO DE 2025).jpg
| imagesize       =
| incumbent       = Niels Olsen Peet
| incumbentsince  = 14 May 2025
| style           =
| appointer       = National Assembly
| termlength      = 2 years
| inaugural       = Modesto Larrea y Carrión (as the president of the National Congress)
| formation       = 31 August 2009
| website         =
|}}
The President of the National Assembly is the presiding officer of the legislature of Ecuador. In 2009 the National Congress of Ecuador was replaced by the National Assembly. The position of President of the National Assembly has existed since then.
